version_description:
Prêt pour l'iPhone X.


Le grand bleu, à débordement.
Il parait que Messenger va faire du paiement. Même pas peur.
Cdiscount. On peut désormais commander sur Cdiscount.com et régler avec Lydia. #blackfriday #noel
On peut maintenant dépenser son solde Lydia avec Apple Pay.
On peut maintenant dépenser son solde Lydia avec Apple Pay.

Plus besoin de faire "virer à ma banque" et d'attendre 3 jours.
Les virements de nos amis se transforment désormais instantanément en argent que l'on peut dépenser partout, grâce à la nouvelle carte virtuelle Mastercard de Lydia.
Avec elle, on utilise son solde Lydia sur Internet et dans les apps. Combinée à Apple Pay, elle nous permet surtout de dépenser sans contact dans les magasins, sans limite de montant. Donc plus besoin non plus de sortir son portefeuille et sa carte plastique.
Juste à temps : les banques sont fermées pendant 4 jours à Nöel et ne feront donc pas de virements.
Virtuelle mais bien réelle, et sans artifices. Joyeux pont de Noël les banques. Joyeux Noël nos très chers utilisateurs.
Pour ceux qui oublient leur mot de passe. Surtout les lendemains de reveillon.
Happy New Year

New design and optimised payment receipts.

You can now transfer money to your bank or refund a payment received directly from a receipt in your transaction history.

You can now request and send money from the homepage. It doesn’t look like much of a change but a click is a click and the devil is in the details.
On the design side, the top menu has changed and the third tab is now devoted to your Lydia account balance. Good news, you can personalize this page by adding a picture to it.
Enjoy!

You can now request and send money from the homepage. It doesn’t look like much of a change but a click is a click and the devil is in the details.
On the design side, the top menu has changed and the third tab is now devoted to your Lydia account balance. Good news, you can personalize this page by adding a picture to it.
Enjoy!

You can now request and send money from the homepage. It doesn’t look like much of a change but a click is a click and the devil is in the details.
On the design side, the top menu has changed and the third tab is now devoted to your Lydia account balance. Good news, you can personalize this page by adding a picture to it.
Enjoy!

Hot off the press: we've tightened our security measures even further  - you can now ask Lydia to display a secure verification page every time you open the app. Perfect if you're worried that somebody nosey might sneak a peek at the balance of your bank account without your permission. Eh, what's that we hear? You've haven't linked your bank  account yet?! Now there are no excuses.
A brand new help center, with all the frequently asked questions, for you to help yourself when you need an info.

After we recently added broader possibilities for payment transfers within the Lydia app, we realized that it was taking you one or two seconds longer to make a payment. That's two seconds too long. To simplify this, we've given the whole payment flow a makeover to make it crystal-clear and lightning-quick.
Plus, you asked and we listened: you can now add emojis to your payment descriptions.

After we recently added broader possibilities for payment transfers within the Lydia app, we realized that it was taking you one or two seconds longer to make a payment. That's two seconds too long. To simplify this, we've given the whole payment flow a makeover to make it crystal-clear and lightning-quick.
Plus, you asked and we listened: you can now add emojis to your payment descriptions.

Not a fan of emojis? Whilst they can be a helpful way to categorise your spending (give them a go!), they can also be a little annoying. So, if you're allergic, you can now disable the suggested emojis bar in your app preference settings.

In this update, we've also added PDF receipts for your payments. These are available in your transaction history. Your accountant can sleep a little easier now.

New way to access your account when you've forgotten your password.

Unfortunately, it seems like, global warming and supermarkets selling out of ice cream heatwave cures aside, this is still one of the biggest bugbears known to mankind. 110,000 of our users forgot their passwords since 1st January. Our data scientists cannot comment on rumours that this statistic triples on a Friday night after payday, right after happy hour ends.

So, goldfish tendencies aside, we decided that, in this case, the forgotten password process also has to be slick to give you the best user experience possible - even in forgotten password purgatory.

That said, our support team would be grateful if you don't accidentally-on-purpose "forget" your password, just to try out the new flow. Pretty please.

We may be continental, but, fuelled by Mr. Freezes, we’ve actually been working hard all summer. For all of you with multiple alter egos, if you somehow signed up to Lydia with your initials or your nickname or completely the wrong name because erm well..., you can now change your name yourself without having to contact our support team to admit that your birth name isn’t actually Captain Underpants.

For our France-based users who like to play fancy and have their phone in Eeenglish, we ’ave another leeettle trick up our sleeves: you can now top up your Lydia account and sub-accounts...by card.
Why’s it better than a bank transfer? It’s instant. But you smart lot knew that already, since you’ve asking us to do it for months.
Let’s just say we got stuck this summer at the beach bar without our wallet, ready to make a contactless payment...except our Lydia balance was too low. The prospect of no happy hour mojitos made us reconsider our life decisions.
The catch? There isn’t one. Just a limit of €200 per month. Use responsibly.

We may be continental, but, fuelled by Mr. Freezes, we’ve actually been working hard all summer. For all of you with multiple alter egos, if you somehow signed up to Lydia with your initials or your nickname or completely the wrong name because erm well..., you can now change your name yourself without having to contact our support team to admit that your birth name isn’t actually Captain Underpants.
For our France-based users who like to play fancy and have their phone in Eeenglish, we ’ave another leeettle trick up our sleeves: you can now top up your Lydia account and sub-accounts...by card.
Why’s it better than a bank transfer? It’s instant. But you smart lot knew that already, since you’ve asking us to do it for months.
Let’s just say we got stuck this summer at the beach bar without our wallet, ready to make a contactless payment...except our Lydia balance was too low. The prospect of no happy hour mojitos made us reconsider our life decisions.
The catch? There isn’t one. Just a limit of €200 per month. Use responsibly.
Lydia accounts can now be shared with friends.

Let’s admit it, you aren’t much without your phone. It's like an extension of your arm.
Immediate answers to all of those niggly questions that we are constantly asking ourselves. No more Google Maps. No more free games with all of those lovely ads popping up everywhere. No more Shazam. Simply put, no more music. No more updates of those friends from primary school that you haven’t spoken to since you left and definitely no updates on what North Kardashian-West ate for breakfast. No more alarms. No more timers. No more reminders. No more calls. Say goodbye to all of your receipts, concert tickets and plane tickets. And especially no more paying back your friends with Lydia!
You are nothing without your phone.
So with this update you can easily insure your phone with one tap! Choose between 2 different insurance options cleverly created by our team.
Please note that for the time being you can only avail of this offer if you live in France.

Choose which of your Lydia accounts is debited when you make a payment using a Lydia card. Particularly handy if you're using your Lydia card to make very specific payments - e.g. a holiday treat from your Lydia "holiday  savings" account, or an Amazon spree from your Lydia "online shopping" account - or to make purchases for The Greater Good - e.g. a Netflix subscription for your whole flatshare to enjoy, or a Louboutin/ World of Warcraft  addiction which you rightly feel your other half should be funding as well. Liberté, égalité, fraternité - sponsored by Lydia.

Choose which of your Lydia accounts is debited when you make a payment using a Lydia card. Particularly handy if you're using your Lydia card to make very specific payments - e.g. a holiday treat from your Lydia "holiday savings" account, or an Amazon spree from your Lydia "online shopping" account - or to make purchases for The Greater Good - e.g. a Netflix subscription for your whole flatshare to enjoy, or a Louboutin/ World of Warcraft addiction which you rightly feel your other half should be funding as well. Liberté, égalité, fraternité - sponsored by Lydia.

Choose which of your Lydia accounts is debited when you make a payment using a Lydia card. Particularly handy if you're using your Lydia card to make very specific payments - e.g. a holiday treat from your Lydia "holiday savings" account, or an Amazon spree from your Lydia "online shopping" account - or to make purchases for The Greater Good - e.g. a Netflix subscription for your whole flatshare to enjoy, or a Louboutin/ World of Warcraft addiction which you rightly feel your other half should be funding as well. Liberté, égalité, fraternité - sponsored by Lydia.

Let’s admit it, you aren’t much without your phone. It's like an extension of your arm.
Immediate answers to all of those niggly questions that we are constantly asking ourselves. No more Google Maps. No more free games with all of those lovely ads popping up everywhere. No more Shazam. Simply put, no more music. No more updates of those friends from primary school that you haven’t spoken to since you left and definitely no updates on what North Kardashian-West ate for breakfast. No more alarms. No more timers. No more reminders. No more calls. Say goodbye to all of your receipts, concert tickets and plane tickets. And especially no more paying back your friends with Lydia!
You are nothing without your phone.
So with this update you can easily insure your phone with one tap! Choose between 2 different insurance options cleverly created by our team.
Please note that for the time being you can only avail of this offer if you live in France.

We have decorated the Christmas tree.

Like us, you like to send a Lydia. It simple and hassle-free. But at the end of the day, we still have to transfer the money to our bank account in order to actually spend it. And that, unfortunately, is a lot less speedy.

And if we could spend our Lydia balance on what we wanted straight away? With contactless payment now on your smartphone, Apple Pay and Internet cards are now possible.

But in case you have missed it we’ve:
added some baubles and glistening garlands to attract those who are a little less curious
improved the configuration of this function that will satisfy those that are a little harder to please.

If you have just received some money or if it is on your money pot you are able to spend any money you have in your Lydia account everywhere, be that online or in-store.
No need to go anywhere near the “Transfer funds” option on your Lydia account and definitely no need to wait several days to see it appear.

We promise you that we love simple decorations. Those that allow the beauty of nature shines through.

During this time we also looked over the Internet card design screen while saying goodbye to iOS9. Please note that the majority of these features are only available to those in France.

Instant loan.

A card payment declined; A booking made 6 months in advance that weighs on the budget; An exceptional purchase.
To avoid going overdraft when these situations come, we have created, in partnership with a bank, an instant small loan feature. Requesting money takes seconds and that's already cool, but what's really unique is that it now just takes a few more seconds to actually getting it credited on your Lydia account.
We worked hard to pimp your Christmas!

Only available in France for now.
Merry Christmas

Top contributors of an account.

We can now see the list of contributors to a shared account: how much each gave, or who gave the most. Convenient to do the accounts, or find out who is the most generous.

Top contributors of an account.
We can now see the list of contributors to a shared account: how much each gave, or who gave the most. Convenient to do the accounts, or find out who is the most generous.

Security update.
As some of you seem to be sharing the code sent to you by SMS, outside of the application, we have decided to start sending you a simple link to click
We will now tell you when you should download a more recent version of the app.
You can now drag-and-drop to transfer money from one of your accounts to another, right from the third tab of the app. It works for every type of account. Very handy.
You can now drag-and-drop to transfer money from one of your accounts to another, right from the third tab of the app. It works for every type of account. Very handy.
Two new iOS widgets to access your account balances and last transactions with a simple gesture from anywhere on your iPhone.
Two new iOS widgets to access your account balances and last transactions with a simple gesture from anywhere on your iPhone.
The fourth tab did a diet and is now much lighter.
The fourth tab looks much nicer like that.
The fourth tab looks much nicer like that.
We've improved the money pot users experience.
We've improved the money pot users experience.
We've improved the money pot users experience.
We've improved the money pot users experience.
We've improved the money pot users experience.
We've improved the money pot users experience.

A new place dedicated to communications Lydia -> you.

We have added a screen where you can find important messages of the moment. Accessible by clicking on the new icon symbolizing a bell, at the bottom of the last tab, we will post alerts and announcements that we think you should not miss. A red badge will tell you as soon as one of these new unread messages is available.

We announced them in our last newsletter about the new money pots. The gift cards are now available for sale throughout Lydia!

They are vouchers to be spent in the biggest stores. You can buy them for yourself or offer them as a gift with the money from your Lydia balance, your sub-accounts or your money pots. These gift cards can also be purchased by credit card directly from the app.

Most brands even offer a bonus to encourage you to choose them.
Think about it before a personal purchase... You'll be able to save some cash ;)

To discover the brand partners, go to the 4th tab of the app as of now and select "Coupons", or directly from the cash out options on your accounts!
Feature available for French users only. Coming soon to other countries.

The Lydia market is now open

Ever wanted to cancel your Internet subscription in a heartbeat, to get compensated for a delayed or a canceled flight, or even to get your flat insured in a couple of minutes, right from your mobile? Well, this is your lucky day: we are now ready to share with you all the good tricks we have been gathering along the way. We put them all in a shiny new place called... "the market"!

Be sure to check out the 4th tab of the app ;).

The Lydia market is now open

Ever wanted to cancel your Internet subscription in a heartbeat, to get compensated for a delayed or a cancelled flight, or even to get your flat insured in a couple minutes, right from your mobile? Well, this is your lucky day: we are now ready to share with you all the good tricks we have been gathering along the way. We put them all in a shiny new place called..."the market"!

Be sure to check out the 4th tab of the app ;).
We fixed small bugs. Happy Black Friday!
We fixed small bugs. Happy Christmas gifts shopping!

Lydia’s third tab gets a new look.

You can now display up to six accounts on your screen such as: Lydia accounts, money pots and joint accounts. Tailor your experience by choosing their display order and customize them with emojis and photos for a personal and magnificent rendering.
Icing on the cake: simply drag and drop to move money from one account to another.

Lydia’s third tab gets a new look.

You can now display up to six accounts on your screen such as: Lydia accounts, money pots and joint accounts. Tailor your experience by choosing their display order and customize them with emojis and photos for a personal and magnificent rendering.
Icing on the cake: simply drag and drop to move money from one account to another.

Icing on the cake: simply drag and drop to move money from one account to another.

Lydia’s third tab gets a new look.

You can now display up to six accounts on your screen such as: Lydia accounts, money pots and joint accounts. Tailor your experience by choosing their display order and customize them with emojis and photos for a personal and magnificent rendering.

Icing on the cake: simply drag and drop to move money from one account to another.

You can now link your bank account with your credit card for a better management of your means of payment.
This version fix some crashes too for a better service quality.

A new version built around generosity

French users can now Lydia a charity.
The University Hospital near you or the Fondation 101 fully dedicated to ER services, the Fondation Abbe Pierre and the Fondation de France are among the 17 charities we selected for the launch.
They need you now more than ever!
You can donate as little as 1€ and since we’re millions of Lydia users, this will make a world of a difference, so don’t be shy.

You’ll find this feature in the new main tab “The Market”, which has been brought to the front line of the app.
On top of the donations, you will find in this tab a selection of innovative financial services by startups and banks.
They all come with a special bonus for Lydia users.

On profite du confinement pour faire un petit rafraîchissement de certains écrans. On vous laisse découvrir la nouvelle vue "identité".

Cette version contient aussi un correctif sur l'indicatif de téléphone par défaut que vous pouvez choisir dans les préférences. Si vos amis sont tous des italiens, des portugais ou autre, cela sera bien plus simple pour vous de leur faire des Lydia.

Enfin, on vous rappelle que vous pouvez faire des dons à des associations à partir de 1€ en toute simplicité. Lydia se joint aux associations pour vous remercier de votre générosité durant ces moments difficiles.

We just did a refreshment of some screens. Take a look on the new view "Identity" in the settings tab.

This version includes a fix on the default international code of phone numbers.

Finally, we remind you that if you live in France you can easily make a donation to an association from 1€. Lydia and all associations thank you for your generosity.

This update contains several bug fixes, including users being logged out from the app and/or their bank account.

The payment and money collection experience have been improved and boosted. The app layout also evolved and offers direct access to our key features: shared accounts, money pots, and share the bill.

And given the news, we added a donation section so giving to an NGO becomes as quick and easy as making a Lydia to a friend.

The payment and money collection experience have been improved and boosted. The app layout also evolved and offers direct access to our key features: shared accounts, money pots, and share the bill.

And given the news, we added a donation section so giving to an NGO becomes as quick and easy as making a Lydia to a friend.
The payment and money collection experience have been improved and boosted. The app layout also evolved and offers direct access to our key features: shared accounts, money pots, and share the bill.
The payment and money collection experience have been improved and boosted. The app layout also evolved and offers direct access to our key features: shared accounts, money pots, and share the bill.
For each purchase of a gift card, valid at the largest e-merchant in France, your Lydia account is instantly credited with 3% of the purchase, to encourage you to donate to charities.
For each purchase of a gift card, valid at the largest e-merchant in France, your Lydia account is instantly credited with 3% of the purchase, to encourage you to donate to charities.
For each purchase of a gift card, valid at the largest e-merchant in France, your Lydia account is instantly credited with 3% of the purchase, to encourage you to donate to charities.

New Lydia virtual cards Visa.
They are created and displayed 10 times faster than before, when you need them, to pay securely online.

New Lydia virtual cards Visa.
They are created and displayed 10 times faster than before, when you need them, to pay securely online.

Payments history, by card.
You can now see the payments you made with a specific Lydia card.

Payments history, by card.
You can now see the payments you made with a specific Lydia card.

We have simplified the recovery of access to your Lydia account when you change your phone number and forget your password. And in case you regret seeing your ephemeral card disappear after only one purchase, we now allow you to transform it in one click into an Internet card, usable as long as you wish.

To meet an exceptional need (gifts, replacement of broken-down equipment), or to spread out substantial expenses, a loan can sometimes prove to be very useful. And we have something new for you: the maximum amount of Instant Loans is changing. Until now they were limited to 1000 €. Loans can now go up to 1500 €, still repayable over a 3 month period.

New design for the two most important options of the app: Collect / Pay. But above all, they are now found in all tabs: history, accounts, etc. No need to go back to the home page to receive or send money.

New design for the two most important options of the app: Collect / Pay. But above all, they are now found in all tabs: history, accounts, etc. No need to go back to the home page to receive or send money.

And we have something new for you: the maximum amount of Instant Loans is changing. Until now they were limited to 1000 €. Loans can now go up to 1500 €, still repayable over a 3 month period.

S'il vous arrivait de faire un Lydia à un mauvais numéro de téléphone à l'avenir, cette mise à jour vous offrira un moyen de l'annuler.
S'il vous arrivait de faire un Lydia à un mauvais numéro de téléphone à l'avenir, cette mise à jour vous offrira un moyen de l'annuler.
S'il vous arrivait de faire un Lydia à un mauvais numéro de téléphone à l'avenir, cette mise à jour vous offrira un moyen de l'annuler.

Au revoir le grand bleu.
Il y a 4 ans, nous introduisions l'une des pages d'accueil d'applications la plus minimaliste qui soit. Aujourd'hui nous la supprimons, pour donner accès plus rapidement à ce qui compte de plus en plus : ses soldes de comptes.
Toujours accessible depuis la page d'accueil, le bouton Payer permet même de gagner un clic pour Faire un Lydia.

Au revoir le grand bleu.
Il y a 4 ans, nous introduisions l'une des pages d'accueil d'applications la plus minimaliste qui soit. Aujourd'hui nous la supprimons, pour donner accès plus rapidement à ce qui compte de plus en plus : ses soldes de comptes.
Toujours accessible depuis la page d'accueil, le bouton Payer permet même de gagner un clic pour Faire un Lydia.

Nouvelle carte Lydia personnalisables

C’est vous qui décidez ce qui sera imprimé dessus.

Nouvelle carte Lydia personnalisables

C’est vous qui décidez ce qui sera imprimé dessus.

L'IBAN Lydia est à l'honneur
Retrouvez désormais l'IBAN Lydia, qui vous permet de recevoir des virements bancaires directement sur votre compte Lydia, sur le dernier onglet de l'application. Vous pouvez le copier d'un clic.

New Lydia virtual cards Visa.
They are created and displayed 10 times faster than before, when you need them, to pay securely online.

La nouvelle carte Lydia peut maintenant être personnalisée au moment de la commande. Une devise ? Un surnom ? Choisissez ce qui sera inscrit sur le recto de votre carte pour la rendre unique. Votre nom sera imprimé au verso, à côté des numéros.

Nouvelles offres dans le Marché.
Un an après l'ouverture des portes du Marché de Lydia, les offres changent. Parmi les nouveaux stands, vous trouverez désormais (toujours depuis le troisième onglet de l'app) : de quoi passer votre éléctricité au vert ; de quoi assurer votre précieux téléphone ; de quoi envoyer de l'argent à l'étranger ; de l'aide pour déménager et trouver un garant ; et toujours de quoi comparer vos factures pour faire des économies sur vos fournisseurs.

Nouvelles offres dans le Marché.
Un an après l'ouverture des portes du Marché de Lydia, les offres changent. Parmi les nouveaux stands, vous trouverez désormais (toujours depuis le quatrième onglet de l'app) : de quoi passer votre éléctricité au vert ; de quoi assurer votre précieux téléphone ; de quoi envoyer de l'argent à l'étranger ; de l'aide pour déménager et trouver un garant ; et toujours de quoi comparer vos factures pour faire des économies sur vos fournisseurs.

Les virements de Lydia vers les banques sont désormais instantanés et gratuits (pour tous les utilisateurs avec un profil vérifié).
L’argent sera en moins d’une minute sur l’autre compte bancaire, quels que soient l'heure et le jour de la semaine, confinement ou pas.

Les virements de Lydia vers les banques sont désormais instantanés et gratuits (pour tous les utilisateurs avec un profil vérifié). L’argent sera en moins d’une minute sur l’autre compte bancaire, quels que soient l'heure et le jour de la semaine, confinement ou pas.

Les virements de Lydia vers les banques sont désormais instantanés et gratuits (pour tous les utilisateurs avec un profil vérifié). L’argent sera en moins d’une minute sur l’autre compte bancaire, quels que soient l'heure et le jour de la semaine, confinement ou pas.

Découvrez un tout nouveau Lydia.
Une nouvelle application qui se veut être la combinaison parfaite entre l’ancien Lydia - l’app pratique pour les remboursements - et le nouveau Lydia, à savoir la super-app qui réinvente le compte courant et l’argent du quotidien.

Nous rêvions de cette version depuis longtemps, mais il nous fallait dans un premier temps consolider l’ensemble de nos fonctionnalités existantes, notamment la carte Lydia. C’est désormais chose faite. C'est une nouvelle page qui s’écrit pour Lydia. À vous de la personnaliser comme vous le souhaitez. Peut-être en commençant par illustrer vos comptes avec une photo ?

Bienvenue sur Lydia 10, l’app qui vous fera oublier celle de votre banque.

Découvrez un tout nouveau Lydia.
Une nouvelle application qui se veut être la combinaison parfaite entre l’ancien Lydia - l’app pratique pour les remboursements - et le nouveau Lydia, à savoir la super-app qui réinvente le compte courant et l’argent du quotidien.

Nous rêvions de cette version depuis longtemps, mais il nous fallait dans un premier temps consolider l’ensemble de nos fonctionnalités existantes, notamment la carte Lydia. C’est désormais chose faite. C'est une nouvelle page qui s’écrit pour Lydia. À vous de la personnaliser comme vous le souhaitez. Peut-être en commençant par illustrer vos comptes avec une photo ?

Maintenant plus d'un mois que notre nouvelle interface est disponible, nous espérons que vous vous y habituez et que vous vous laissez surprendre par l'usage compte courant.

Aujourd'hui nous vous invitons à visiter le 3e onglet de l'application pour découvrir un tout nouveau profil. En première ligne, votre IBAN Lydia qui vous permettra de recevoir des virements et des prélèvements. C'est probablement également l'occasion pour certains d'entre vous d'ajouter enfin une photo de profil ? Vous rayonnerez dans l'historique de transaction de vos proches.

Vous les avez peut-être déjà croisées, mais nous avons bel et bien lancé nos nouvelles offres intitulées Lydia Bleu et Lydia Noir. Depuis l'éclair situé en haut de l'écran d'accueil de l'application, vous pouvez consulter un véritable comparatif de nos abonnements gratuits et payants. C’est aussi l’occasion de découvrir tous les nouveaux services que nous proposons désormais, on a pas mal bossé.

Vous les avez peut-être déjà croisées, mais nous avons bel et bien lancé nos nouvelles offres intitulées Lydia Bleu et Lydia Noir. Depuis l'éclair situé en haut de l'écran d'accueil de l'application, vous pouvez consulter un véritable comparatif de nos abonnements gratuits et payants. C’est aussi l’occasion de découvrir tous les nouveaux services que nous proposons désormais, on a pas mal bossé.

Vous les avez peut-être déjà croisées, mais nous avons bel et bien lancé nos nouvelles offres intitulées Lydia Bleu et Lydia Noir. Depuis l'éclair situé en haut de l'écran d'accueil de l'application, vous pouvez consulter un véritable comparatif de nos abonnements gratuits et payants. C’est aussi l’occasion de découvrir tous les nouveaux services que nous proposons désormais, on a pas mal bossé.

L'été arrive et vous avez besoin de vacances. Lydia n'est pas juste une application de remboursement, elle est aussi votre compagnon idéal pour recevoir de l'argent. Pourquoi ne pas étaler le paiement de la réservation du votre lieu de séjour grâce à nos Petits Prêts Express ? De plus, vous pouvez demander de l'argent à vos amis spontanément ou encore partager l'addition d'une transaction déjà effectuée. Aussi, la création d'un compte commun vous permettra de mieux gérer vos dépenses de groupes.

La fête n'est pas terminée mais maintenant un peu limitée ! Les nouvelles limitations d'usage sont bel et bien en place depuis janvier mais vous pouvez désormais retrouver directement dans l'application le detail complet de votre consommation des fonctionnalités Lydia. Evitez les mauvaises surprises mais surtout découvrez nos offres payantes illimitées. Rendez-vous dans le 3e onglet de la page profil pour les découvrir.

De plus nous avons stylisé vos cartes bancaires dans le 2e onglet de l'application, retrouvez-les et distinguez-les plus facilement grâce à leur nouvelle couleur et leur logo situé directement dessus.

Suite à nos récentes nouveautés, de nombreux utilisateurs se servent de Lydia comme compte courant ! Dans cette version, nous avons conçu un nouvel écran qui va permettre à ceux qui utilisent Lydia de plus en plus, de mieux les accompagner dans leur choix d'abonnement Lydia. Lydia Bleu, pour son nombre de transaction illimité ? Lydia Noir pour son grand nombre de création de cartes Internet ? Rendez-vous sur votre profil, dans l'écran "Mes limites d'usage". Pour les autres nouveautés, on vous laisse les découvrir par vous-même, cela devrait vous sauter aux yeux.

Et si vous receviez votre salaire sur Lydia ? Pour organiser vos dépenses avec vos sous-comptes, bénéficier des virements instantanés et même payer par carte sans avoir besoin de recharger votre compte, des milliers d'utilisateurs ont déjà passé le cap, rejoignez-les. Il a été montré que votre salaire arrivera plus tôt sur Lydia que sur vote compte bancaire. En plus, votre argent ne dort pas chez Lydia, il profite à des associations. Alors n'attendez plus et donnez votre RIB a votre employeur, vous le trouverez dans l'onglet de votre profil !

Le compte d'épargne selon Lydia.

15 milliards d'euros. C'est la somme collectée sur les livrets A au premier trimestre 2021 et c'est un record. Pourtant, il n'était pas encore possible d'ouvrir un compte d'épargne rémunéré sur Lydia… jusqu'à présent. Mettez à jour votre application pour ouvrir votre compte d'épargne en quelques minutes. La rémunération classique, déjà intéressante (0.6%), est même boostée à 2% les deux premiers mois. L'accès est réservé aux profils vérifiés.

Le compte d'épargne selon Lydia.

La conciergerie se refait une beauté.

Lydia Noir donne accès gratuitement à un service de conciergerie : une équipe d'assistants personnels à disposition par SMS pour répondre à toutes sortes de demandes. Pratique pour récupérer un colis, organiser un événement, trouver une idée de restaurant...

Ce service est accessible depuis le Profil (3e onglet) avec un tout nouveau design.
